content:
2019 is off to a great start with another set of releases that address bugs and add new features to Aurelia. We're also continuing to enable more plugins for script-file deploy along the way. Of particular note is our recent improvements to the `aurelia-ui-virtualization` plugin for virtual and infinite scrolling. What? You didn't know there was an official plugin for that? Check out [this demo to see what it can do](https://aurelia-ui-virtualization.now.sh/) and then head on over to [the ui-virtualization documentation](docs/plugins/virtualization).

Read more below to get the rest of this month's release details.

## Minor Releases

Minor updates include new features, updates to bugs and performance improvements.

### [aurelia-logging-console 1.1.0](https://github.com/aurelia/logging-console/compare/1.0.0...1.1.0)

#### Bug Fixes

* Apply ISP to improve code flexibility. ([075234e](https://github.com/aurelia/logging-console/commit/075234e))

### [aurelia-history 1.2.0](https://github.com/aurelia/history/compare/1.1.0...1.2.0)

#### Features

* Add go method.
* Add history index getter.

### [aurelia-history-browser 1.3.0](https://github.com/aurelia/history-browser/compare/1.2.0...1.3.0)

#### Features

* Add support of data-router-ignore attribute ([0d8f7a0](https://github.com/aurelia/history-browser/commit/0d8f7a0))
* Add go method
* Add history index getter

### [aurelia-loader-default 1.2.0](https://github.com/aurelia/loader-default/compare/1.1.0...1.2.0)

#### Bug Fixes

* do not reject unsupported AMD loader ([846befe](https://github.com/aurelia/loader-default/commit/846befe))

#### Features

* add support of dumber-module-loader ([1d9433f](https://github.com/aurelia/loader-default/commit/1d9433f))

### [aurelia-fetch-client 1.8.0](https://github.com/aurelia/fetch-client/compare/1.7.0...1.8.0)

#### Bug Fixes

#### Features

* **alameda:** Tests could not load files by path ([68b3ffa](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/68b3ffa))

#### Features

## Patch Releases

Patch updates include only fixes to bugs and performance improvements.

### [aurelia-dependency-injection 1.4.2](https://github.com/aurelia/dependency-injection/compare/1.4.1...1.4.2)
